attributes.action: justice if you can afford it
attributes.additional_details: A poor man can't afford justice. Bullying intimidating management treated badly witch hunts until you just can't stand it anymore so after 20 years service you leave . What can you do now . They can't do a thing because I can't afford justice. I will need to pay over £1000 before I Evan get to court . If you don't win you will have to pay your ex employers costs that can be 1000s . So walk away with your tail between you legs . So justice only if you can afford it . 20 yrs for a new young management team to end my life.
